title: Steps to take transferring phone
content:
Recently I saw a post that talked about selling an old phone. The answer mentioned there are "certain steps" to take to un-enroll the phone from Google.

When I sell or donate an old phone, I encrypt they phone's memory and then perform a factory reset â€“ hoping that that this will clear my data and bring the phone back to a like-new state.

Is this sufficient to clear my data and make the phone ready if there is a next user?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a
